SENT.plain: We report two patients with Fanconi anemia (FA) and moyamoya disease taken from a clinical database composed of 434 FA patients
Both are compound heterozygotes for the 322delG and R185X mutations in the FA complementation group C (FACC) gene
This combination of mutations is not found in any other of the 174 FA families screened
Either the 322delG or R185X mutation alone or in combination may predispose to primary, possibly congenital, vascular anomalies
